content:
Prev: Colored shadow wall Up: Exploratorium, July 2, 2001 Next: Timothy at the controls

Golden Gate Bridge



From the Marin vista point, looking back towards SF and the exploratorium.
The vista point was a zoo of tourists and hucksters, and the light was very hazy --
we took the obligatory tourist snaps and left quickly.
Taken Monday, July 02, 2001, 01:53:51pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 1112kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/400s @ F7.0, ISO 100, 266mm
PS Curves 28:0 - 218:255, Saturation +10
